The bottom navigation bar allows movement between the primary functions in the app. \nIt is split into 3 tabs - Feed, Photo and Help (from left to right).

Topping up food and water is done here. 
The left column displays information about the previous top-up of food, the amount of food left, and allows the top-up of food through the "Feed Me Food!" button. 
The right column displays information about the previous top-up of water, the amount of water left, and allows the top-up of water through the "Feed Me Water!" button. 
At the bottom, automatic topping-up of food and water is enabled/disabled by toggling the switch on/off.
You can take a picture of your hamster at any point of time to see how it is doing. \nSimply do so through the \"Snap A Picture!\" button.

Set/Change your hamster's name and/or profile picture here. 
Click on the blue button with an arrow to choose an image: 
 1. Use our default hamster profile picture 
 2. Upload an image from your phone gallery 
 3. Take a photo with your phone camera 
 4. Use the latest HamsterCare photo taken in the Photo Tab 
Click the green button with a tick to confirm changes for both name and profile picture.
